channel.title: Wear an item to convert to ancients
channel.description:
Does anyone know how i can make it so if you wore an unholy book you would switch to ancients and if you took it off you would switch back to normal magic tab?
unholy book it 3842

item.title: Wear an item to convert to ancients
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

if (wearID == 3842) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
} else {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
}

Give that a shot. I think that’ll make it so you can only wear ancients when you’ve got the book equiped, sorry if it doesn’t work.

Read full topic
item.source: Wear an item to convert to ancients

item.title: Wear an item to convert to ancients
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

prima that is not working for me[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2008, 04:58:59 pm[/size][hr]never mind, but how would i make it so that if i unequipt the book it will convert back to normal magic?

Read full topic
item.source: Wear an item to convert to ancients

item.title: Wear an item to convert to ancients
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Edit the wear method to check if you’re equiping the holy book, if so to switch the magic book (setSideBarInterface). Not exactly sure which method is used check which item you removed, but you can find it in a few minutes of searching.

Read full topic
item.source: Wear an item to convert to ancients

item.title: Wear an item to convert to ancients
item.dc:creator: @Prima Prima
item.description:
@Prima wrote:

In:

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

Add:

if (wearID == 3842) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); }
